text: Mehbooba Mufti (born 22 May 1959) is an Indian politician who served as the last Chief Minister of Jammu and Kashmir as a State, from 4 April 2016 to 19 June 2018. She was the first woman Chief minister of the state. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Jammu and Kashmir Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Mehbooba Mufti
